oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Dominion Barn Dance - Osborne Brothers - WRVA Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of an Old Dominion Barn Dance segment featuring the Osborne Brothers (performer), Benny Birchfield (performer), and Roberta Osborne (performer) on radio station WRVA (Radio Station : Richmond, Va.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Osborne Brothers; Benny Birchfield; Roberta Osborne
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song -- Is This How A Broken Heart Dies (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about the performance and introduces the next song -- Foggy Mountain Breakdown (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about country music and introduces the next song -- Ruby, Are You Mad At Your Man (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song as an encore -- Just One More Chance With You (Osborne Brothers) -- Closing statement ([Unidentified]) (incomplete) -- [Unidentified] introduces the Osborne Brothers -- Salty Dog Blues (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks and introduces the next song -- Bluegrass Express (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song -- The Cuckoo Bird (Osborne Brothers) - Bobby Osborne announces their next show and other performers -- Cripple Creek (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne introduces the next song -- I Know What It Means To Be Lonesome (Osborne Brothers) -- Bobby Osborne talks about Paul Craft and introduces the next song -- Cryin' Holy Unto The Lord (Osborne Brothers) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WRVA (Radio station : Richmond, Va.); Osborne Brothers; Osborne, Bobby; Osborne, Bobby; Osborne, Sonny; Osborne, Roberta;
